availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Judson Littlefield (Lebanon, Marion County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Lebanon, Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Maine native. Son of Ivory Littlefield and Eunice Littlefield. Merchant in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Maine, Franklin County, Chester, p. 18.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, p. 36.
Find A Grave, "Judson Littlefield (July 6, 1836-June 7, 1864)," Memorial #50561196, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50561196 (accessed February 5, 2019).
